key: This toolkit transforms your OOMOL workspace into a complete PDF processing powerhouse. With 15+ specialized blocks, you can handle everything from basic operations like merging and splitting to advanced features like OCR, form filling, and security management.
convert-html-content-or-web-pages-to-pdf: Convert HTML content or web pages to PDF format
convert-multiple-image-files-into-a-sing: Convert multiple image files into a single PDF document
image-files-to-convert-to-pdf: Image files to convert to PDF
convert-pdf-pages-to-individual-image-fi: Convert PDF pages to individual image files
input-pdf-file-to-convert-to-images: Input PDF file to convert to images
extract-metadata-and-document-informatio: Extract metadata and document information from PDF files
input-pdf-file-to-extract-metadata-from: Input PDF file to extract metadata from
add-annotations-and-comments-to-pdf-file: Add annotations and comments to PDF files
compress-pdf-files-without-quality-loss-: Compress PDF files without quality loss using various optimization techniques
compression-level-1-9-higher-means-bette: Compression level (1-9, higher means better compression)
remove-password-protection-from-encrypte: Remove password protection from encrypted PDF files
remove-specific-pages-from-pdf-files: Remove specific pages from PDF files
output-pdf-file-with-deleted-pages: Output PDF file with deleted pages
password-protect-pdf-files-with-encrypti: Password protect PDF files with encryption
extract-text-content-from-pdf-files: Extract text content from PDF files
input-pdf-file-to-extract-text-from: Input PDF file to extract text from
combine-multiple-pdf-files-into-a-single: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document
add-page-numbers-to-merged-pdf: Add page numbers to merged PDF
convert-scanned-pdfs-to-searchable-text-: Convert scanned PDFs to searchable text using OCR
rotate-pdf-pages-by-specified-angles: Rotate PDF pages by specified angles
split-pdf-into-separate-files-by-pages-o: Split PDF into separate files by pages or sections
page-ranges-e-g-1-3-5-7-10-only-for-page: Page ranges (e.g., "1-3,5-7,10") - only for page_ranges mode
pages-per-part-only-for-equal_parts-mode: Pages per part - only for equal_parts mode
add-text-or-image-watermarks-to-pdf-file: Add text or image watermarks to PDF files
watermark-text-leave-empty-for-image-wat: Watermark text (leave empty for image watermark)
